reference.title: Highlighting domain elements
reference.shortdesc:
The highlighting elements are used to highlight text with styles such as bold, italic, and monospaced. These elements are intended solely for use by authors when no semantically appropriate element is available and a formatting effect is required.Need to decide on a consistent style for short descriptions for these.
